Border

Uses of Border in <Unnamed>
 

Classes in <Unnamed> that implement Border
(package private)  class LineBorder
          A class which implements a simple line border in the color black.
 

Methods in <Unnamed> that return Border
 Border GUIComponent.getBorder()
          Returns the border of this component or null if no border is currently set.
 

Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Border

          Sets the border of this component.
